Name: Lollo Campaign: Navigation I
Description: The Day 1 Campaign content has been updated. Maji is ready for you to join forces and take on the new tasks.
QuestDesc: The Day 1 Campaign content has been updated. Maji is ready for you to join forces and take on the new tasks.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The program shows the color on this part of the map has changed. You did it, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Remember "Lollo Hitman" from last time? I've loaded some of its features into this new program. The trips out in the wild can be tough, and emergencies can pop up any time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If "Lollo Hitman" was a response measure for emergencies, then the new program acts as an early warning system.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Couriers can provide real-time feedback on road conditions to the "Lollo Navigator," which means the map is constantly being updated.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So your plan is to combine the map with the various services mentioned earlier?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Exactly. We also have other new services currently running in their trial phases. You've done a great job today. Let's try out the rest of the features some other time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: For this trial run, {PlayerName}. I plan to merge the users as one group. A group I know best, the Lollo Logistics.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: For them, the map is king. As long as...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just as Maji is about to explain the details to you, the applet on the "Lollo Navigator" starts chimingâ€¦

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: See that? That's a call for action for "Lollo Navigator." I'm sending you the coordinates I just received.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To get familiarized with all the features, it's better to go and see for yourself.
